basics.name: Maurin Schickli
basics.label: Fullstack Developer - Vice World Champion in Industry 4.0
basics.summary: Fullstack Developer skilled in creating useful features, optimizing workflows, and delivering innovative ideas. Dedicated to building solutions.

education.institution: GBS Gewerbliches Berufs- und Weiterbildungszentrum St. Gallen

awards.title: Vice-World-Champion in Industry 4.0
awards.summary: Competed against top professionals worldwide to create IoT-enabled smart systems with features like alerts, image recognition, and database integration.

awards.title: SwissSkills Winner in Industry 4.0
awards.summary: National champion in developing innovative Industry 4.0 solutions, including smart sensors and IoT systems.

projects.name: DeepL UI
projects.description: I was part DeepL UI a project, executed entirely by apprentices, to implement a custom user interface for the DeepL API. This solution reduced costs by over 80%. The project taught us how to take software from concept to deployment, emphasizing teamwork, requirement management, and delivering a user-focused product.

projects.name: Cocktail Mixer
projects.description: A machine capable of creating customized cocktails based on user input via a tablet. Features included ESP32 microcontroller, stepper motors, and a MES-like application for managing bottles and orders.

projects.name: Resume Generator
projects.description: A tool for programmatically generating resumes from JSON, making it easier to create and update resumes. I created this because I struggled with updating my resume without destroying my formatting every time.
